title: Governance Structure - IAU
snippet: Elected for a 4-year non-renewable term, the IAU President is elected from among members of the Administrative Board by the General Conference. He/She chairs the Administrative Board and the Executive Committee.

title: About IAU - IAU
snippet: Elected for a 4-year non-renewable term, the IAU President is elected from among members of the Administrative Board by the General Conference. He/She chairs the Administrative Board and the Executive Committee.

title: IAU President's Message | IAU
snippet: Here is a message from our President Carl Jubran, thanking everyone who has been involved with IAU France's study abroad program.

title: Presidency — International Association of Universities
snippet: 2008-2012, 13th IAU President: Juan Ramon de la Fuente, Former Rector, National Autonomous University of Mexico.
